unnormalised: Locals in Sector 44, Noida are up in arms after a series of thefts targeting residents. The most recent incident occurred at H. No. C-23, where Mrs. Sharma reported the loss of jewelry and cash. "We're all living in fear," she said, echoing the sentiments of many in the neighborhood.
normalised: Locals in Sector forty four, Noida are up in arms after a series of thefts targeting residents. The most recent incident occurred at House Number C-twenty three, where Missus Sharma reported the loss of jewelry and cash. "We're all living in fear," she said, echoing the sentiments of many in the neighborhood.

unnormalised: The police are investigating the cases, focusing on addresses like Flat 101, Tower A, Gulmohar Apartments, and Bungalow No. 15, Shanti Nagar. According to reports, the thieves seem to be targeting houses with poor security.
normalised: The police are investigating the cases, focusing on addresses like Flat one hundred and one, Tower A, Gulmohar Apartments, and Bungalow Number fifteen, Shanti Nagar. According to reports, the thieves seem to be targeting houses with poor security.

unnormalised: Many residents are now considering installing CCTV cameras and reinforcing their doors and windows. The Sector 44 RWA has also called for an emergency meeting to discuss the situation and brainstorm solutions.
normalised: Many residents are now considering installing C-C-T-V cameras and reinforcing their doors and windows. The Sector forty four R-W-A has also called for an emergency meeting to discuss the situation and brainstorm solutions.

unnormalised: "We need to work together to protect our homes," said Mr. Gupta, the RWA president, whose own residence at House No. B-56 was almost burgled a week ago. He urges all residents, especially those living in apartments near the main road at Plot No. 7, to be extra vigilant.

unnormalised: The police have assured residents that they are taking the matter seriously and have increased patrols in the area. They are encouraging anyone with information to come forward. They can be reached at the Sector 39 police station near Pin Code 201301.
